content.html: People will give their passports to random apps, authorise some browser extension to read every one of their emails, pipe everything that happens in their home directly to Bezos. And then write a 22 tweet stranger danger treatise over Mastodon
content.value:
People will give their passports to random apps, authorise some browser extension to read every one of their emails, pipe everything that happens in their home directly to Bezos. 

And then write a 22 tweet stranger danger treatise over Mastodon
